==German== ===Etymology=== From perfect participle of {{m|de|verheiraten||to marry, get married}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/fɛɐ̯ˈhaɪ̯ʁaːtət/}} * {{audio|de|De-verheiratet.ogg|Audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|Ver|hei|ra|tet}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|-}} # [[married]] (in a state of marriage; having a wife or a husband) ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj-notcomp|verheiratet}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|getraut}} * {{l|de|vermählt}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} * {{R:DWDS}}
